body_html:
Me either, it seems to work now. Maybe you fixed something along the way :) Maybe this can be closed, having fewer temp tensors along the way also helps. Might be even better if complex product gets implemented some day.

It would be nice if the OOM exception was some standard PyTorch exception, not a CUDA one.

body:
Me either, it seems to work now. Maybe you fixed something along the way :) Maybe this can be closed, having fewer temp tensors along the way also helps. Might be even better if complex product gets implemented some day.

It would be nice if the OOM exception was some standard PyTorch exception, not a CUDA one.
